dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependent_to.description:
The Extend Project is a fork of the OpenFOAM opensource library for
Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). This offering is not approved or
endorsed by OpenCFD Ltd, producer and distributor of the OpenFOAM
software via www.openfoam.com, and owner of the OPENFOAM trademark.
dependent_to.name: foam-extend

description:
Mesquite (Mesh Quality Improvement Toolkit) is designed to provide a
stand-alone, portable, comprehensive suite of mesh quality improvement
algorithms and components that can be used to construct custom quality
improvement algorithms. Mesquite provides a robust and effective mesh
improvement toolkit that allows both meshing researchers application
scientists to benefit from the latest developments in mesh quality
control and improvement.
name: mesquite

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
